attributes.description:
A 1971 W111 Mercedes 220 with manually operated sunroof.
The engine was recently replaced with a period correct unit. The vehicle is mechanically sound and the suspension has also been done.
The interior has been well looked after, the radio will have to be replaced though as the current unit, while working, is not period correct
A full rundown of all of the completed work can be provided should you require more info.
attributes.title: 1972 Mercedes-Benz 220 1972 Mercedes-Benz (W111)
